***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Classical_Newar 𑐳𑑂𑐫𑐵𑐔 (syāca), from Proto-Sino-Tibetan *g-sat_~_b-sat.
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [sjaje]
**** Verb[edit] ****
स्याये • (syāye) (Newa Spelling 𑐳𑑂𑐫𑐵𑐫𑐾)
   1. to kill
